title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama integration to LangChain LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or chatters in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with strong-typing and async I/O.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling options.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module providing reusable CI/CD pipelines for building and pushing custom Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instances with session memory.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, importable as github.com/ollama/ollama/api.

title: ollama-model-catalog
summary: Community-curated catalog of ready-to-use Modelfiles for niche domains and fine-tunes.
